item.title: Please i need help with two codes
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

first off when i compile i get

client.java:13656: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if (command.startsWith(“heal”)) {

but i have written like this

} else if (command.startsWith(“heal”)) {
removeequipped();
// remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);

I dont understand this Error please help

and i’m having trouble with my score board when I or
some one else clicks on it they get logged out.

//In-game highscores
public int playerRank = 0;

public void resetRanks() {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
server.ranks[i] = 0;
server.rankPpl[i] = “”;
}
}

public void highscores() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@dre@official Fusion-Scape Highscores! TOP 20!", 8145);
for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to display more, simply the number you want it to display, say 20 = for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
if(server.ranks[i] > 0) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl[i]+ "@bla@ - Total Lvl:@whi@ " +server.ranks[i], 8147+i);
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
resetRanks();
}
//end highscores

please help me soon

Read full topic
